content: *this cute hooded scarf sometimes called a scoodie is warm and works up quickly lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # cwes-scarves skill level easy size child 9-10 adult medium child s adult s dimensions 11 14 inches wide x 30 40 inches long from top of hood to scarf end wool-ease® sportweight article #660 *discontinued* 435-870 yards crochet hook - size i-9 gauge 4 reps = 5 inches 12 75 cm with size i hook worked in 1-row pattern beginning along long edge fold scarf in half lengthwise and stitch back seam to form hood optional make 2 large tassels and attach to center back of hood construction schematics are provided
